QuestData.Title: Manaforge B'naar
QuestData.Description: You may have noticed one of Kael's manaforges on your way here. You know, the large purple buildings sucking energy from the sky?$B$BWe were sent here by the Sha'tar to investigate them. You can help our information gathering efforts by obtaining a personnel roster. Giving us an idea of who's there and what they do will prove to be invaluable information.$B$BWe believe Captain Arathyn, leading a ballista team just outside of Manaforge B'naar, is in possession of one such roster. Obtain it for us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Spymaster Thalodien at Area 52 wants you to go to the outskirts of Manaforge B'naar and retrieve the B'naar Personnel Roster from Captain Arathyn.$B$BCompleting quests for the Scryers will cause your Aldor reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you obtain the items I asked of you, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! With this roster we can make more educated decisions when targeting Kael's followers at the manaforges.$B$BIt's too bad, I was beginning to take a liking to killing his lackeys indiscriminately.
